thread.title: BRIEF-Emirates NBD Closes Club Financing for UNEC's Deira Mall

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Emirates NBD Closes Club Financing for UNEC's Deira Mall

organizations.name: brief-emirates nbd closes club financing for unec

text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - EMIRATES NBD BANK:
* CONCLUDES FINANCING OF 1.30 BILLION DIRHAMS FOR UNITED ENGINEERING CONSTRUCTION COMPANY TOWARDS BUILDING WORK ON NAKHEELâ€™S DEIRA MALL PROJECT
* ACTED AS AGENT BANK, SECURITY AGENT AND MANDATED LEAD ARRANGER IN CLUB FINANCING ARRANGEMENT
* CLUB FINANCING ARRANGEMENT ALSO INCLUDES COMMERCIAL BANK OF DUBAI AND ARAB BANK AS MANDATED LEAD ARRANGERS Source: ( bit.ly/2Cz4CV1 ) Further company coverage:
